title: Impeachment Fatigue, popBeyONCe 1.30.20
itunes:title: Impeachment Fatigue, popBeyONCe 1.30.20
description:
In episode 559, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Tiff Stevenson to discuss impeachment updates, if the MSM is getting tired of the impeachment, Trump's New Jersey rally, if a traditional Democrat can win, Trump allies handing out cash to black voters, people thinking Coronavirus is connected to the Corona beer, Popeye believing it inspired the new Ivy Park line, the new Hunger Games book, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. McConnell Says GOP Doesn’t Have Votes to Block Impeachment Witnesses
  2. Trump campaign: New Jersey rally attendance 26.3% Democrats and 10.4% people who didn't vote in 2016
  3. Trump allies are handing out cash to black voters
  4. The coronavirus has nothing to do with Corona beer. But, some people seem to think so.
  5. Popeyes starts off 2020 strong by selling its employee uniforms fans say look like Beyoncé’s sold-out Ivy Park x Adidas collection
  6. Here's What We Know About the Hunger Games Prequel The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
  7. Who's the star of the Hunger Games prequel? Read the exclusive first excerpt
  8. Extract from Hunger Games prequel sparks anger among fans
  9. The Hunger Games is getting a prequel that centers on the villain: a young President Snow
  10. The Hunger Games Pulls a Star Wars With Its Prequel Hero 
  11. WATCH: Little Dragon - In My House

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
